meanings.definition: Relating to or involving work or a job
meanings.sent1: She enrolled in a vocational program to learn job skills.
meanings.sent2: The vocational training helped him secure employment.
meanings.sent3: The vocational tasks kept her busy all day.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to vocational duties was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The vocational nature of the course made it practical and useful.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a vocation or occupation
meanings.sent1: Her vocational interests aligned with her career goals.
meanings.sent2: The vocational choices he made shaped his professional path.
meanings.sent3: The vocational discussions at the meeting were enlightening.
meanings.sent4: In his mind, the city had a vocational charm.
meanings.sent5: The vocational aspect of the job was what drew her in.

meanings.definition: Providing skills or training for a specific job or career
meanings.sent1: The vocational school offered specialized training programs.
meanings.sent2: He attended a vocational workshop to enhance his expertise.
meanings.sent3: The vocational lessons were both informative and engaging.
meanings.sent4: She saw the vocational course as a stepping stone to success.
meanings.sent5: The vocational guidance counselor helped students plan their futures.
